sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { ProjectsContainer, ImgContainer, Img, SummaryContainer, Summary, SkillsContainer, SkillsUsed, SkillsList, Skill, ProjectLinkContainer, ProjectLink } from './ProjectElements' import SectionHeader from '../SectionHeader' const ProjectSection = ({id, header, img, imgHeight, imgWidth, summary, skills, projectLinkDesc, projectLinkUrl}) => { return ( <> {header} Summary: {summary} Skills Used: {skills.map((skillValue, index) => { return ({skillValue}) })} {projectLinkDesc} ) } export default ProjectSection
